name: Aquila Insight
tagline: With the right insight, you’ll know what’s right.
description:
Aquila Insight works with organisations to understand their challenges and then identify, structure and use the most relevant data to address these needs.   We focus on extracting the maximum value from this data which allows our clients to make more effective decisions. Our expertise covers the complete consumer lifecycle from acquisition through to retention across multiple channels.
 As we are able to offer onsite and offsite analytical consultancy and delivery we are fully flexible to respond to our client’s needs. Aquila’s recruitment process reflects our culture, our staff must be analytical, pragmatic, creative, and need to be able to translate data into business opportunities.
READ MORE...
